emotion.name: the emotion name, such as 'angry' or 'depressed'
emotion.description: a humurous description of the emotion
emotion.img: the filename for the image.  this will be used by the app.

shouldHave.name: things that complete the the sentence:  i should have...

movie.id: this is the id that is obtained from The Movie Database
movie.name: the name of the movie
